amendment.description: An amendment numbered 105 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit the Department of Labor from providing climate literacy training.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.
